item.description:
This ride is similar to one we took a few weeks back minus the rain we rode in all afternoon.

 

Meet at the Hess at 7:30, then on to Westborough plaza for coffee by 8:30, Charlton plaza by 10 and to rt 20 west toward springfield through areas his by Tuesday's tornados. Then North to Amherst to Judy's for Popovers and west to find new roads before heading for home by sundown at 8PM.

The first full day adventure, about 300 fun filled miles!

See ya'll there!

Text me at 617-584-4797 or leave a note when you RSVP as to where we will meet you and when. All times are somewhat flexible, padded for extra comfort. :)

Paul

 

This is a touring member ride - make sure you are paid up for the year! Membership form available in the Files section on this site - send $20 via paypal to pmaker@mac.com - membership helps cover meetup.com fees to keep this club alive!
item.name: Springfield Tornado Tour
